phrases: I end up waking up needing to use my inhaler a couple of times a week.

Diminished lung sounds throughout with occasional slight expiratory wheezes bilaterally.
Flovent 110 mcg, one puff twice daily, and continue Ventolin 2 puffs every 4–6 hours as needed.
Developing an asthma action plan to address triggers like cats and manage symptoms.
Reevaluation in one month or sooner if symptoms worsen.
